name: Maze Odyssey Demo
description:
This is a demo for a game, I'm currently working on.
It is a Maze-game inspired by Pacman and Bomberman. 

Controls:
Arrow keys or WASD for movement
P pauses the game

Please check the controls section of the game to learn more about it.


To exit the game, press the windows key or corresponding key on Mac and then close the game window-icon. I will add an exit button soon.
